reviews.review:
The sarcasm is strong with this one. The game, not this review. :P

The game is overall very intense, and gives a different feeling the the original Portal, because almost right off the bat, the testing chambers begin to seem less polished, and very unkempt. Eventually, you find yourself in the behind the scenes of Aperture, and you know you're not supposed to be there. Things begin to get sp00py. Luckily, you have Wheatley there right by your side to provide you with a healthy dose of humor and sarcasm.

And, when there isn't Wheatley, there's Cave Johnson, who's double the fun. The game is significantly longer than the first one, I'd estimate at least three times longer, if not four. The puzzles are difficult, imo a little too difficult (I've been stuck on a particular one for the last 6 months...), but overall the game is great. It shows a little more of the backstory of Aperture, and keeps you engaged and entertained the whole way through. And that's just the campaign. Then there are the thousands upon thousands of Steam Workshop levels submitted by the community. You're part of the community, so yes, you can make levels too. Definitely worth your money, even though it is twice as expensive as Portal, it holds much more content than portal.

8/10 - #NoSaltZone #LemonGrenades
Valew muito apena!

酷炫震撼的开场，加入的新角色增强了游戏“人工智能式搞怪”的特色。

本作增加了解谜元素，丰富了解谜场景，实验室外的流程谜语性更强了。

有几关确实卡了一会，但是解出之后，你会发现作者不会设计刁钻的解谜方案，解谜方案通常只有一种。多留意注意可利用的白墙和斜坡，逐一击破关键，非常有成就感。

还没玩双人模式。

Portal 2 to gra, która ma bez wątpienia utkwiący w głowie na długo początek, który nie przypomina gry logicznej, a wręcz przeciwnie grę akcji albo nawet horror. Dużym plusem tej gry jest to, że istnieje możliwość projektowania własnych poziomów. Jeżeli lubicie wytężać swój umysł za pomocą WASD i myszki to ta gra jest stworzona dla Was.

This game is abolutley amazing! I bought this game to play over the holidays and I couldn't stay off it. I never though a game could be this good. The developers have nailed the difficulty curve for all of the puzzles, and the story is awesome. The test chamber maker is surprizingly simple and effective to use. I am not the most creatie person, but I found it easy to make a really to make fun levels that I never got frustrated at. All ruond great game. I cant find any faults, you wont be dissapointed with this game.

I LOVE this game, I don't know how it could get better

I have no words. I picked up this game at the summer sale and to be honest i can't say i had very high expectations. The first one were good but often the second game turns out worse, which doesn't seem to be happening at Valve. This is a great game! Really loved it! Right now i have already played the game twice and. The reason i decided to replay this fantastic game is probably not because of the "game" itself, even tough the gameplay certainly had replayability, but the one reason i decided to do another playthrough is the voiceacting, especially Wheatley's. Stephen Merchant did such a good job as the sidekick for the player and everybody grew to love him. I never get tired of hearing his jokes during the game I would easily give it a 10/10

pros:
Great game overall.
Great story( Yes puzzle games can have good stories too).
Great level design.
Great puzzle's (obviously)
And last but but least, great voice acting that made this game into a "one in a lifetime" experience.

cons:
i can litteraly only come up with ONE thing about the game that wasn't perfect, and the "problem" were in the level design. In some parts of the game, like chapter 6-9 if i remember correctly. the levels were really open, that's all i'm gonna say to keep it spoiler free. (if you played the game you know what i mean). The "problem" there, maybe it was just me but sometimes i found it really hard to know where you were supposed to go. My first playthrough i spent like 30 minutes trying to get a door open only to relaise that the door were a part of a puzzle i had already completed. Similar things happened more than a few times to me but i wouldn't call it a "problem".
Overall it was a great game and it is totally worth every single euro (even tough i picked it up on sale).
Still waiting for Portal 3 and Half-life 3 tough :I
Muy divertido y a veces desafiante, nada más que decir, creo que ya todo el mundo sabe que este juego es una obra maestra

Космооооос!!! Круто! 
ПТИЦА!! ЗЛО!
ГЛЭДОС! Картошка!

Игра во всем превосходит первую часть. Более совершенная механика, графика, сюжет. Более проработаны персонажи, показана история Aperture Science и лабораторий исследования природы порталов, да и вообще игра стала живее, динамичнее. Теперь мы не только проходим камеры Глэдос, не только изучаем их подсобки. В этот раз нам показали всю структуру комплекса: от древних камер старых корпусов, до динамических и безумных камер Уитли. Мы путешествуем с кубами по трубам, видим бездонные шахты комплекса и это захватывает. 

Вспоминая сюжет сразу упомяну что он постоянно и резко меняет всю суть, то мы ищем выход, а через минуту пробудили Глэдос, пришли её уничтожить, а оказались на самом дне и т.д. Скучать точно не даст!

Чего таить, считаю Портал одним из лучших проектов Valve и однозначно он достоин внимания и стоит своих денег. 

П.С. есть мастерская, и коорператив, прошли сингл? накачал камер и радуйся! а можешь и свою создать.. надоело одному? зови друга! Всем угодили)
